home.h2: I am Software Developer from Glasgow, Scotland.

about.education: First Class degree in BSc Hons Web and Mobile Development.
about.copy:
I am a software developer from Glasgow, Scotland who specialises in web applications. I have extensive experience with both frontend and backend development, which allows me to build and deploy powerful, beautiful projects.

I mostly develop in PHP and JavaScript and have many years using the LAMP stack (Linux, Apache, MySQL, PHP). I also love building applications using Node.js, VueJS and using that sweet ES6 (with cross platform support of course!). Often I dive in to new frameworks and stacks that the open source community come up with!
